document_data.name: The Black Blade
document_data.mainbody: '''The Black Blade''' was the name given to a powerful brigand operating in the [[Eastern Heartlands]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite polyhedron/58/The Everwinking Eye: Adventures in Maskyr's Eye|26}}
document_data.Description: Never seen without a mask, the Black Blade was believed to be a female [[human]].
document_data.Abilities: She was known to possess [[magic]]al powers or else equipped with [[magical item]]s.
document_data.Activities: This brigand habitually robbed traders traveling by land in the southern [[Dalelands]], eastern [[Cormyr]], and western [[Sembia]].
document_data.History: By around [[1357 DR]], three whole war bands had been sent to kill the Blade Blade, and she had defeated all three of them. [[Adventuring companies]] had also come for her; she was thought to have forced [[The Company of The Fire Shield]] to flee and to have slaughtered [[The Company of the Torch]] in their entirety.
